Name: GLOBAL:SOFAConventions
Comment: For measuring SRIRs in a single room with a single excitation source (e.g., a loudspeaker) and a listener containing an arbitrary number of omnidirectional receivers (e.g., a microphone array).

Name: GLOBAL:DataType
Comment: Shall be FIR.

Name: GLOBAL:RoomType
Comment: Shall be either shoebox or dae.

Name: GLOBAL:License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL:DatabaseName
Comment: Unique name of the database. Used for classification of the data.

Name: GLOBAL:RoomShortName
Comment: Short name of the Room.

Name: GLOBAL:RoomDescription
Comment: Informal narrative description of the room.

Name: GLOBAL:RoomLocation
Comment: Location of the room.

Name: GLOBAL:RoomGeometry
Comment: URI to a file describing the room geometry.

Name: RoomTemperature
Comment: Temperature during measurements.

Name: RoomTemperature:Units
Comment: Units of the room temperature.

Name: RoomVolume
Comment: Volume of the room.

Name: RoomVolume:Units
Comment: Units of the room volume.

Name: RoomCorners
Comment: This variable is used to provide attributes RoomCorners:Type and RoomCorners:Units. Its value can be ignored.

Name: ReceiverDescriptions
Comment: M- and/or R-dependent versions of ReceiverDescription with specific descriptions of the receivers.

Name: ReceiverPosition:Type
Comment: Can be of any type enabling both spatially discrete and spatially continuous representations.

Name: EmitterDescriptions
Comment: M- and/or E-dependent version of EmitterDescription with specific descriptions of the emitters.

Name: EmitterPosition:Type
Comment: Shall be either 'cartesian' or 'spherical', restricting to spatially discrete emitters.

Name: EmitterView:Type
Comment: Shall be 'cartesian' or 'spherical', restricting to spatially discrete emitters.

Name: Data.IR
Comment: Impulse responses.

Name: Data.SamplingRate
Comment: Sampling rate of the samples in Data.IR and Data.Delay.

Name: Data.SamplingRate:Units
Comment: Unit of the sampling rate.

Name: Data.Delay
Comment: Additional delay of each IR (in samples).

Name: MeasurementDate
Comment: Optional M-dependent date and time of the measurement.
